website_summaries.verdict: These tires stand out for their toughness, quality, and durability.
pros: Comes as a set of two tires
Sturdy four-ply construction for extra toughness
cons: While not compressed, these tires do come pretty flattened-out in a box
You'll need to leave them in the sun or near a heat source for a bit before trying to mount them

customer_reviews.title: Tough to Install
customer_reviews.text: Tires themselves seemed great, good tread, good quality. I couldn't get them to inflate for the life of me. Probably not any fault of the manufacturer, but just be aware these are not easy to install. I had to buy a tire changer kit from harbor freight to change out the old ones, couldn't do it with normal hand tools. Once the tire was on the rim I could not get it to inflate. Tied a come along around the outside and cranked it down, still no luck. Ended up returning and buying wheel and tires already mounted from the hardware store for just a bit more $
customer_reviews.author: mjf05002

customer_reviews.title: I will start by saying the product is great but I not real Happy about the way the ...
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying the product is great but I not real Happy about the way the company handled my order. I had to many things go wrong and no explanation. It took to long to get the product from the seller because they gave me someone else tracking number therefore my order was delivered to someone else. in the computer my item was delivered but when I called UPS it was a total different name and address. so how does this happen. This is not the only order I had this happen and I still have not had any contact from the seller on my second order. I had to file a claim.
customer_reviews.author: DragonFly Wings

customer_reviews.title: Grrr eat after mounted
customer_reviews.text: Lawnmower tires still cost money to be mounted... they were so tight (made that way) even I gave in and payed to have these tight suckers mounted.. and I have done a Hummer tire with runflat (insert).. holy F%#*
customer_reviews.author: anoddtod

customer_reviews.title: Good tires. Match OEM
customer_reviews.text: Good tires. Match OEM. Fairly easy to mount as small tires go. Didn't have to use a strap around the tire as others I've used. Had to bump the tire on the ground after mounting to get a starting seal then aired them up and they sealed @20 PSI. Wife is happy camper now as I got back to finishing the yard from when the original tired was slashed by roadside debris.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W.

customer_reviews.title: awkward
customer_reviews.text: Great product, however, even though they were the size we needed, they were for a different type vehicle and so the size did not work. And we ruined one trying to put it on. And the shipping was expensive sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Good tires for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money & they weren't terribly bad mounting/seating beads. My lack of 5 starts is due to upon delivery,both tires came bound together by a type of shipping tape & were totally exposed to the shipping process. Upon arrival & inspection,one of the tires had about a 3" long narrow slice on the side wall. As of now,it doesn't affect the tire holding air,but definitely something to keep an eye on in the future
customer_reviews.author: Charles Douglas Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them for the mowing season while cutting 51/2 acres. Been good so far. Delivered on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: q

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tires for the price! I bought these to replace the tires on my John Deere 17cu.ft. trailer. They were a perfect fit. I've only had to add air once since putting them on. The price is far better than you'll find at any of the tractor implement dealers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tires are much better than the ones that came with my troy-bilt 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: Tires are much better than the ones that came with my troy-bilt 30 in riding mower.. Cost me 10 bucks to get mounted on the rims at a local tire store.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price...
customer_reviews.text: These worked great on the front of my cub cadet tractor. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ergov

customer_reviews.title: great tires for a great price
customer_reviews.text: the tires came just as pictured. Upon inspection they seem well made and good quality. the installation went as expected. I chose the 4 ply tire because I have a snow blower for my garden tractor and these will support the weight. I have been using them for a few weeks now and they are working well. If these are your size, I'd get them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave DeVries

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, but only time will tell if the rubber is any good!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far but some time has to go by before a true conclusion can be drawn, because, I've had a lot of problems with these small tires made with inferior rubber that literally rot apart in 12 months (no kidding, big rot holes after a year!). Many are made in China and the quality is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Davison III

customer_reviews.title: Fine so far...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. No complaints. NOT super-easy to install, but doable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got these.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Replaced my steering tires on my mower I bought in summer of 2000. These are sturdier and make steering much better. I'm looking forward to many years of a better steering mower.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement tires
customer_reviews.text: These were for replacement of the 10+ year old tires on a Craftsman 14 cu ft dump cart. The originals are only 2-ply. These are 4-ply. SEARS wanted $65 per tire. I got these both for less than $60. Well made and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ab

customer_reviews.title: Great value 4 ply tire
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tires for the front of my riding mower. They fit perfectand work great. Also a great value. When you are comparing take notice, these are 4 ply. Many others are 2 ply for more money. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: eagle93

customer_reviews.title: Nice dpe the money
customer_reviews.text: A little tight going on. Dish soap helped a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Scottwiz

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for my lawn tractor trailer
customer_reviews.text: Best buy for my lawn tractor trailer. Needed 4 and bought them at a very good deal by the pair. Nothing else compared to them in quality or price. Altogether, with $40 to mount all 4, and the cost of the tires it came to almost $160 to put new tires on my old 3 cu. ft. lawn tractor utility trailer.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Good value and happened to have the exact same tread as original.  Should last
customer_reviews.text: A little tough to put on. So we used large flat blade screw drivers and tire iron tools and armor all as a lubricant. Used a ratchet tie down to squeeze down the tire so the bead could be set.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Geelhoed

customer_reviews.title: Price was great!! The JD dealer wanted $48 for one tire.
customer_reviews.text: These tires are for my John Deer mower. They are 4 ply and look great. Just put them on 4 weeks ago and to early to tell how they will wear or hold up. Price was great and it only cost me $20 to have them mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Jean A.

customer_reviews.title: Tires
customer_reviews.text: These are a great replacement for the front tires on my my John Deere tractor. 4-ply gives a little extra toughness for rough wear.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire
customer_reviews.text: Took the to the local tire store to have them mounted. It was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: James Hay

customer_reviews.title: Wont hold air!
customer_reviews.text: The tires arrived on time and look great, but they wont hold air! I have replaced my tires a few times, but this is the first time this has happened... I have been airing them up before every mow, but will have to buy tubes to put in. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Payne

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty looking and feel. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: Thick and heavy. A bit of a challenge to mount, so warm them up and use rich soap solution. So far have loaded them up with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: AJC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Easily installed at home. Excellent value.Fast delivery. No special tools were required to mount the tires on the rims. Two large screwdrivers, some liquid soap and an air compressor and you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my Deere GT235
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect on my John Deere GT235. I patched and plugged the old tires again and again. I should have just put these on and been done with it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Getler

customer_reviews.title: Quality tires
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for the small garden trailer. Good quality tires. The small tires are hard to seat on the rim. I had to pay for mounting but check the internet first because there are a few techniques I wasn't aware of.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: New Tires
customer_reviews.text: Just had them mounted and I installed them back on the tractor. I have not driven on them yet, but I will be pulling the leaf swiper soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth S. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be a good value. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value if your handy around the garage.
customer_reviews.text: The tires seem to be working out great. I had not too much trouble mounting them after watching a few YouTube videos. I read a lot of reviews and chose these.
customer_reviews.author: victor medina

customer_reviews.title: Good Tires, Good Times, now my riding mower is 2 inches taller in the front.
customer_reviews.text: nice tires, man are tires this size hard to change by hand. what a chore. Tires are just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: tires worked
customer_reviews.text: even through the tires came smashed in the carton and the carton was not smashed the tires still worked so all in all happy good price
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I had them installed at a local garage and they look great and make my yard cart like new
customer_reviews.text: These tires are a steal at that price. They are very heavy duty. I had them installed at a local garage and they look great and make my yard cart like new.
customer_reviews.author: David_Jr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These tires are top quality, look great. These 4 ply are going to work much better than my old 2 ply ,(used on utility cart)
customer_reviews.author: LMBRME

customer_reviews.title: The size of tires and the ply rating is crucial to longevity.
customer_reviews.text: The tires fit good, they went on a John Deere GT262 front. They look good.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Harvey

customer_reviews.title: fit nice, hold air
customer_reviews.text: Oregon Brand tires, fit nice, hold air, a little hard to get on the bead but I did it with just hand tools.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the second set of tires I bought, I had another lawn mower that needed tires. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Steering does not slide on the hills any more
customer_reviews.text: They have a lot of traction when I first put them on and it made it a little harder to steer but they do not slip on the hills
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good traction
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and easy to install. Perfect packaging as well. I'll buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The tires did not fit as stated and had a hard time returning the items at my expense.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Small tractor tires
customer_reviews.text: These were the right size and I took them to the local gas station to be mounted on the rims.
customer_reviews.author: Snickers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement tires for my riding mower!
customer_reviews.text: Great new 4 ply tires for my craftsman tractor! Like new again!
customer_reviews.author: Dji515

customer_reviews.title: Came on time and works very good.
customer_reviews.text: Got these tires and they were as described. Came on time and works very good.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita C.

customer_reviews.title: Mower tires.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tires for the price. Shipped quickly in a box, not just plastic wrapped together like I've got from some people.They mounted quickly and easily. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Krzyzanowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend and he was thrilled at the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: chewy

customer_reviews.title: good tires for the price
customer_reviews.text: Came triange shaped but easily expanded. Mounted easy with spoons and holding air 100%.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Tires squished in box
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Tires squished in box. Had to set near house registers for a few days then mounted Good quality
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Great place to and great deal best price free shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: Great place to and great deal best price free shipping fast right on time I would tell everyone about this and I will be back Thank You

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks like good tires, being 4 ply should work fine

customer_reviews.title: very very happy. i think the 4ply tire will out last
customer_reviews.text: very very happy .i think the 4ply tire will out last 2ply

customer_reviews.title: Tires were great. Hoping to not get so many flats since ...
customer_reviews.text: Tires were great. Hoping to not get so many flats since they are a heavier duty tire. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: new tires for cadet cub
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them yet,but will do so this winter. These tires look great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy to have the new tires.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tires seem to be excellent quality and mounted easily. Tires weren't shipped crushed so had no problem seating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They go round and round like they are meant to do
customer_reviews.text: They go round and round like they are meant to do. They do grip well in turns and are more stable than 2 ply rags.
customer_reviews.author: tomc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tires came in good shape, first day had a flat, but plugged it.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for his lawn tractor they went on really good and came on time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go Tubeless Get 4 Ply
customer_reviews.text: My riding lawnmower came with 2 ply tubeless tires and although I could have gotten a tube to fix it, I decided to get a 4ply tire and am glad I did. The ride is more stable and not as rough turns definitely better and sharper. I would recommend 4 ply to anyone instead of replacing a tire with a tube.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality tires and a great price. I will buy more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tires are well made, and heavy. Delivery was much faster then I expected...

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted an got her when they said
customer_reviews.author: JDW

customer_reviews.title: No Name
customer_reviews.text: Tires fit and look good. I took the old ones off and put he new ones by hand. It takes some work but it can be done. No name on the side wall. I put these on a JD L130 Lawn tractor.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dallstream

customer_reviews.title: Great services and ease if ordering.
customer_reviews.text: The tires turned out to be great! Great price and fast delivery!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones I took off - I'm happy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tires at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around and you can't beat these for the price. Great delivery too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: finally got the right size needed and a better tire as this one was 4 ply

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Better quality than my original John Deere ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Better quality than my original John Deere tires. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Watson

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Tires were exactly as advertised and order was filled in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have recommended the tires to my friends
customer_reviews.text: Quality was beyond my expectations! I have recommended the tires to my friends. The price was great too!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson V. Raines

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tires. Had tire store install on rims. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tires
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for replacement tires for my yard cart. I thought that since I went cheap I would be disappointed but man was I wrong. These tires are a lot better than the originals. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: good heavy duty tires
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy tires mounted easy, looks like they should last a good long while.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Muscott

customer_reviews.title: Tough Tires
customer_reviews.text: These are four ply rated; much better than the local tires and could see the difference right away. Slightly larger width-wise as well, but fit the rims perfectly. No more flats on my rider mower. I live in an ag area, so my stuff is tougher than just ordinary lawn. If you need something tough, these are the right tires.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Kreager

customer_reviews.title: good quality tire
customer_reviews.text: product was as described. fast delivery. good quality tire. good price!!!
customer_reviews.author: buddmaxx

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I purchased them
customer_reviews.text: These tires are exactly what I needed for my 925 JohnDeere mower. I'm glad I purchased them .
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Walter

customer_reviews.title: They fit like OEM. Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Tires were exactly as described. They fit like OEM. Good quality and value. They arrived a day earlier than expected.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these tires to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely buy these again.. I recommend these tires to everyone!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good deal on tires.
customer_reviews.text: good 4ply tires at a ggod price delivered in short time. Well pleased.

customer_reviews.title: front tractor tires
customer_reviews.text: looks like nice quality,came on time,installed on the tractor,no problems,nice to have non leaking tires now,thanks,would order again for other parts.

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice quality, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took about an hour to remove old tires and put new ones on. They are very nice quality, especially for the price. I'm using them on an Agri Fab 17 cu. ft. trailer for my tractor.
customer_reviews.author: D. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: better than the ones that came on the mower, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Where is it made?
customer_reviews.text: Ad neglected to say the item was imported from China. A secondary label was pasted atop the printed label indicating the country of origin. This was deliberate. Since this was an Elfster gift for someone, the requester will get it. If it was for me, I would have returned it. We don't need stuff from China. Things like comforters can be made here in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Set of 2 16x6.50-8 16-6.50-8 Turf Tires 4 Ply Tubeless Garden Tractor Lawn mower

feature_bullets: turf tread is great for grass and not turfing
